title: New: Fractions – Breathe
content:
For someone who grew up and still currently resides in the North East, I’m at times rather out of touch with the local scene.

When I saw GoldFlakePaint mention a new outfit from my neck of the woods, I just had to check them out, and wasn’t disappointed. Describing themselves as “a female fronted synth pop band featuring current and ex members of Lavotchkin & End Reign, as well as local producers Joey Murphy, Worry Party & RoadToCairo”, there’s definite hints of CHVRCHES, M83 and CitR favourites Ecstasy in their bold, near-athemic debut track, Breathe. Perhaps not quite as ‘clean’ as the aforementioned acts, however it’s early days, and it’s a mightily promising first outing.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
